original_text: Then the man returned home and he was now their king. He asked those ten servants to come to him. He had given them each some money. Now he wanted to know how much more money they had now. They should have bought things with it and then they should have sold those things again for more money.
korean_text: 귀인이 왕위를 받아가지고 돌아와서 은화를 준 종들이 각각 어떻게 장사하였는지를 알고자 하여 그들을 부르니

sentences.original_text: and he was now their king

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 열 명의 종들에게 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: He had given them each some money
how much more money they had now
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이제 얼마나 더 많은 돈을 가지고 있는지

sentences.original_text: They should have bought things with it
and then they should have sold those things again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 물건들을 다시 팔아야 했습니다
